name: thunderbird-ai-compose
description: Thunderbird Mail Extension that helps you compose emails using AI
author: Bobby <me@shi.foo>

scripts.build:ts: tsup src/background.ts src/popup/popup.ts src/options/options.ts --format iife --out-dir build --splitting false --sourcemap false
scripts.build:static: cp src/manifest.json build/ && mkdir -p build/popup build/options && cp src/popup/*.html build/popup/ && cp src/options/*.html build/options/ && cp node_modules/webextension-polyfill/dist/browser-polyfill.js build/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:ts && npm run rename:ext && npm run build:static
